name: Amog sus
description:
How to play

You are being chased by the imposter, find the 8 sus's to escape the forest. watch out for the sticky tree leaves don't get caught.

Credits

JesusA6776 on Youtube/Created the game, innersloth/made among us, sketchfab  models used  were created by MatMadness made the among us crewmate model, punolix made the tree model, DJMaesen made the flashlight model, and Micheal Karel made the knife model.
